name: politico
text: Senate Majority PAC (a top super PAC run by allies of Chuck Schumer) and Women Vote! (the super PAC arm of EMILY‚Äôs List) combined to funnel more than $5 M to Sunflower State, a group formed last month that spent heavily in the Kansas GOP race https://t.co/y7ygGrTAjA

name: politico
text: The pop-up super PAC bashed Rep. Roger Marshall, behind whom national Republicans had ultimately rallied in the primary, while also elevating Kris Kobach, whom Republicans considered a threat to their Senate majority https://t.co/y7ygGrTAjA

name: politico
text: The spending was widely presumed by operatives in both parties to have come from Democrats, but Democrats involved in the effort officially confirmed it to us this week https://t.co/y7ygGrTAjA

name: politico
text: Senate Majority PAC spent $3.55 million on the effort, and Women Vote! added $1.75 million, officials in those organizations told us. The spending details are set to be revealed publicly today anyway because of FEC monthly filing deadlines. https://t.co/y7ygGrTAjA
